module.name: Misc Destinations
module.description: Allows creating destinations that dial any local number (extensions, feature codes, outside phone numbers) that can be used by other modules (eg, IVR, time conditions) as a call destination.
module.changelog: *2.5.0.1* #3018, #3043 spelling and delete link does not show if not being used as dest *2.5.0* #2845 tabindex, added delete and add icons *2.4.0.2* #2843 Russian Translation *2.4.0.1* added depends on 2.4.0 *2.4.0* Extension/dest registry, it translation *1.3.4.3* changed categories *1.3.4.2* bump for rc1 *1.3.4.1* changed freePBX to FreePBX *1.3.4* destination changed from Dial(Local/nnn@from-internal) to Goto(from-internal,nnn,1), no reason a new channel should be created *1.3.3* Minor formatting changes *1.3.2* Add he_IL translation *1.3.1* Updated help text *1.3* First release for FreePBX 2.2 - Fixed GUI issues
